ing: 1 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as JifÂ® Mocha Capuccino-Flavored Hazelnut Spread)
des: "When I realized I had no frosting, pudding, or even whipped topping, I decided to make this one up! We love that it's not as super-sweet as most frostings."
ins: Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric hand mixer until softened. Add hazelnut spread, milk, and cream sherry; continue beating until smoothly combined into a frosting.
